name: Cream Of Chicken Soup
author: MARBALET
summary: This is a good basic cream of chicken soup recipe. You can use cornstarch instead of flour to make the roux, if you are allergic to flour. You can also omit the salt, if you are on a restrictive diet. The best thing about making recipes yourself, is that you control what goes into your soup, minus the unhealthy preservatives!
ingredients: 2 cups finely chopped, cooked chicken meat
directions: In a 3 quart saucepan,  heat oil
Let this form a paste, or roux
Then, gradually stir in the milk and continue stirring until thickened
Add chicken to white sauce mixture
Add sugar, salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Mix well and simmer for 20 minutes over low heat
If soup is not as thick as desired, mix a small amount of corn starch with a small amount of water and add to soup
